data: {"page":1,"results":[{"backdrop_path":"/kVftNpJHp6ahi7MhW6XRZkoLzCL.jpg","id":32407,"title":"Malice in Wonderland","original_title":"Malice in Wonderland","overview":"A modern take on the classic fairytale, Alice in Wonderland, set in South East England.An American law student in London. Knocked down by a black cab, she wakes with amnesia in a world that's a million miles from home - Wonderland. We follow her adventures as she's dragged through an underworld filled with twisted individuals and the lowest low-lifers, by the enigmatic cab driver, Whitey. She needs to find out who she is, where she's from and use what wits she has left to get back home in one piece. As her journey progresses she discovers nothing is what it seems, realizes that fate and life are terminally entwined, and finds true love lurking in the unlikeliest place.","poster_path":"/rFbyN3bOtQEMgZzF30xE4570NKu.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[14,18,12],"popularity":10.205,"release_date":"2010-02-05","video":false,"vote_average":5.3,"vote_count":62},{"backdrop_path":null,"id":339375,"title":"Vive la mariée... et la libération du Kurdistan","original_title":"Vive la mariée... et la libération du Kurdistan","overview":"Kurdish expert Hiner Saleem (Shero) wrote and directed this French comedy-drama, set inside the 100,000-population Kurdish community in Paris. The original French title translates as \"Long Live the Bride...and the Liberation of Kurdistan.\" Cheto (Georges Corraface) seeks a wife via videotapes while still seeing his French girlfriend, immigration office worker Christine (Stephanie Lagarde). Cheto places an order for a beautiful girl, but he's disappointed when her sister, country girl Mina (Marina Kobakhidze), arrives at the airport as a substitute. Family pressure forces him to marry her. Unhappy with the way she's treated by Cheto, Mina acquires some progressive notions from Leila (Schahla Aalam) and other local feminists, leading to confrontations with Cheto.","poster_path":null,"media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[35],"popularity":3.419,"release_date":"1998-06-03","video":false,"vote_average":5.7,"vote_count":3},{"backdrop_path":"/75z9PjKWJC13dUFZFNMsOSi85gf.jpg","id":77985,"title":"Maria's Lovers","original_title":"Maria's Lovers","overview":"When her teenage sweetheart Ivan returns home from WWII, Maria eagerly accepts his marriage proposal, looking forward to a lifetime of happiness. But her joy is short-lived when Ivan’s dark past shrouds their wedding night in misery, driving a wedge between them that neither knows how to remove. Confused and depressed, Maria attempts to mend her true love’s heart despite the advances of other suitors. But when a traveling musician hits the right note, Maria struggles to justify her unfulfilling life. Is her passion too powerful to be contained within the sanctity of marriage?","poster_path":"/eUBg7YCyjk4n6yWuuEmOJVCnlHY.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[18,10749],"popularity":11.029,"release_date":"1984-10-03","video":false,"vote_average":6.2,"vote_count":50},{"backdrop_path":"/xf0SUnV3JlrtSgVQXzevB7QYOzA.jpg","id":56623,"title":"Ao: The Last Hunter","original_title":"Ao, le dernier néandertal","overview":"When his clan, including his wife and baby girl Néa, are massacred, Ao, a desperate Neandertal man, decides to leave the North country where he has been living for the South where he was born. His aim is to join his twin brother, from whom he was separated when he was nine. On his long and adventurous way home, he meets Aki, a Homo Sapiens woman...","poster_path":"/k4nKlmubLYBzdJAMPkEfFk8WdCp.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[12,36],"popularity":10.408,"release_date":"2010-01-29","video":false,"vote_average":5.8,"vote_count":55},{"backdrop_path":"/bA1Iwro3ntX1wipeJbYyuP5vi2S.jpg","id":38670,"title":"The Five Man Army","original_title":"Un esercito di cinque uomini","overview":"At the behest of local revolutionaries, a mercenary enlists four specialists in various combat styles to help him rob a Mexican Army train carrying $500,000 in gold.","poster_path":"/5NSCCCQn06UfkKap9rIXL5g7GPG.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"it","genre_ids":[37],"popularity":11.402,"release_date":"1969-10-16","video":false,"vote_average":6.6,"vote_count":47},{"backdrop_path":"/hbkxvvACRaram9JNEZEPG8730cb.jpg","id":30250,"title":"Cold Souls","original_title":"Cold Souls","overview":"Paul is agonising over his interpretation of 'Uncle Vanya' and, paralysed by anxiety, stumbles upon a solution via a New Yorker article about a high-tech company promising to alleviate suffering by extracting souls. He enlists their services—only to discover that his soul is the shape and size of a chickpea.","poster_path":"/4ejJjTwoEqIKiZJOyPaHlTJh2jL.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[35,18,14,878],"popularity":12.198,"release_date":"2009-08-07","video":false,"vote_average":6.0,"vote_count":145},{"backdrop_path":"/YbzfnWSeZvfABKn0zSyY3IY0IV.jpg","id":8749,"title":"Hamlet Goes Business","original_title":"Hamlet liikemaailmassa","overview":"When Hamlet discovers his father’s deceased body, he finds himself pulled into a power struggle as his scheming uncle attempts to secure a monopoly on the Scandinavian rubber duck industry. En partenariat avec le Centre spatial français, un grand jeu est organisé. \"Le ticket pour l'espace\", un jeu à gratter, va permettre à deux civils de séjourner dans la station orbitale européenne.","poster_path":"/2wtaiJGPQsYpvceSFQWLw3nfvVq.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[35,878],"popularity":7.232,"release_date":"2006-01-16","video":false,"vote_average":5.169,"vote_count":136},{"backdrop_path":"/hYie1j4M7u6z4nOoKot1fTCkMyU.jpg","id":37501,"title":"Vieni avanti cretino","original_title":"Vieni avanti cretino","overview":"Pasquale Baudaffi, on amnesty, comes out of prison and starts looking for a job with the help of his cousin Gaetano. But first he goes to what was once a brothel, but, unbeknownst to our hapless hero, has been taken over and rented as a dental office. Pasquale finds himself at the center of endless misunderstandings. He tries to be a gamekeeper but that's not okay, he tries to be a waiter in a bar: he immediately gets his orders wrong and he is fired. His performance as a garage keeper was negative. The very latest experience is in an electronics company but its insertion into the futuristic mechanism triggers the craziest complications. The encounter with a lost dog allows him to get to know his mistress and thus discover the woman of his life.","poster_path":"/rwLrAHikdryHGn9HsUTX2hON9H9.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"it","genre_ids":[35],"popularity":8.357,"release_date":"1982-04-07","video":false,"vote_average":6.9,"vote_count":187},{"backdrop_path":"/1FxwuCdaMmCEsl3hSlafKRHR8Th.jpg","id":9564,"title":"Asterix \u0026 Obelix Take on Caesar","original_title":"Astérix \u0026 Obélix contre César","overview":"Set in 50 B.C., Asterix and Obelix are living in a small but well-protected village in Gaul, where a magic potion concocted by Druids turns the townsfolk into mighty soldiers. When Roman troops carve a path through Gaul to reach the English Channel, Caesar and his aide de camp Detritus discover the secret elixir and capture the Druid leader who knows its formula, and Asterix and Obelix are sent off to rescue them.","poster_path":"/sJ4zNakOuWcsW6ssH1qk80JehQ2.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[10751,12,35,14],"popularity":27.61,"release_date":"1999-02-03","video":false,"vote_average":6.008,"vote_count":1827},{"backdrop_path":"/ufOOBCOyZbCp6xNYiDH3Zwz5f96.jpg","id":40180,"title":"Fear Over the City","original_title":"Peur sur la ville","overview":"A serial-killer frightens Paris by phoning young ladies at night, telling them insults about their lives.
